document_data.name: Holy Builder
document_data.mainbody: '''Holy builders''' were specialty [[priest]]s of the [[Church of Gond]] who excelled at invention and fixing broken things.<ref name="WaPotR-p77" >
document_data.Activities: Holy builders spent most of their time tinkering with items and working on designs. They often forgot to verbally preach about [[Gond]] to others, but the Wonderbringer didn't seem to mind.
document_data.Culture: These individuals were fascinated with every aspect of an item's construction and how to improve upon it.
document_data.Abilities:
Holy builders were skilled in repairing and building items, allowing them to fix or produce about twice as many items as others during a same time period.

These priests could not [[turn undead]]. They were easily surprised since their minds were constantly analzying the devices around them instead of paying attention to danger.
document_data.Possessions: Most holy builders wore attire more suited to blacksmiths than priests, including [[leather]] [[apron]]s and common dark work clothes which were usually stained, scorched, and generally unkempt.
